Consistently rated as excellent by 245-30zr24 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 275/40R20 Tire Size The 275/40R20 is the wider variation of the standard 245/45R20 that comes on many of today’s sport and luxury cars. It’s an excellent option if you’re looking to get more grip and a wider contact patch than what comes stock. It’s also the stock size for many European luxury cars, so there are plenty of tires made with comfort in mind. __Popular vehicles include:__ 2005-2014 Audi Q7
1999-2018 BMW X5
2011-2018 Bentley Continental GT
2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro
2005-2013 Land Rover Range Rover Sport
2017-2022 Lexus LC | LS
2011-2019 Volvo XC60
If you’re wanting the most grip out of your all-season tire, the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus) makes a great option. Built with Continental’s SPORTPLUS+ technology and up to a 50,000 mile tread life warranty, you can be ready for the road ahead. If you’re looking for something more extreme, a great option would be the [Nitto NT555 G2](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/nt555-g2). Built for warmer months, this tire offers ultimate performance on dry and wet roads. The NT555 G2’s twin center ribs increase straight-line stability while the four wide grooves shed water with ease. Paired together, this design makes the NT555 G2 an amazing summer ultra-high performance tire. Last but not least, the [Yokohama Advan Sport A/S Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-sport-a-s-plus) offers the best of both worlds. Combining extra-large shoulder blocks with a four pitch tread variation creates a tire that not only handles whatever you throw at it, but also provides a quiet and comfortable ride. So whether you’re looking for a tire to handle the corners, or a comfortable tire to put on your luxury sedan, SimpleTire has a set of 275/40R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
